Sentencas: In this paper, the structural and transport properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF) perovskites and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 (LSCFN64262) perovskite are presented.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CO0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 perovskite type oxides

Sentencas: Crystal structure of the samples was characterized by means of X-ray studies with Rietveld method analysis.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CO0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 perovskite type oxides

Sentencas: DC electrical conductivity and thermoelectric power were measured at a wide temperature range (80-1200 K) in air.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CO0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 perovskite type oxides

Sentencas: For La0.2Sr0.8Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF2828) and La0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF4628) perovskites a maximum observed on electrical conductivity dependence on temperature exists at about 750 K. It can be associated with an appearance of oxygen vacancies and implies a mixed ionic-electronic transport.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CO0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 perovskite type oxides

Sentencas: A growing amount of oxygen vacancies at higher temperatures causes a decrease in the electrical conductivity due to a recombination mechanism associated with lowering of the average valence of 3d metals.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CO0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 perovskite type oxides

Sentencas: A similar characteristic was found for LSCFN64262 perovskite, which also exhibits a relatively high electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of selected La1-xSrxCo0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CO0.2Fe0.6Ni0.2O3 perovskite type oxides
